title: [Vigil's End, Flooded Path]
description: Thick perse vines meanderingly creep up a tilted sandstone watchtower, the image evocative of grasping tentacles dragging it deeper into the sodden earth.  A stained and tattered white banner, emblazoned with a faded aquamarine wave crest, drapes limply from the fractured parapet.  Overflow from the nearby stream drowns the surrounding grass and spills rust-hued water onto the winding cobblestone road.
